data.event: In the past it was known as Nawelim in German.

event.title: consists of a single-story stone house with a 16th-century foundation; the year 1858

data.event: Several structures in Belo are registered as cultural heritage: The farm at Belo no. 1, known as the Lenart farm (Slovene: pr' Lenart), consists of a single-story stone house with a 16th-century foundation; the year 1858 is carved into the door casing.

event.title: year 1827; this was a building used

data.event: There is a cottage bearing the year 1827; this was a building used by a retired farmer that continued to live on the farm.

event.title: was shot in Belo on 20 March 1943

data.event: There is also a plaque on the house commemorating the communist people's hero Lizika Jančar (a.k.a. Majda; 1919–1943), who was shot in Belo on 20 March 1943.
